# thetalake_directory_group (Resource)

Theta Lake Directory Group Resource. Manages a directory group in Theta Lake.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thetalake_directory_group" "example" {
  name        = "Example Group"
  description = "This is an example directory group"
  external_id = "EXT-123"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Directory Group Name

### Optional

- `description` (String) Directory Group Description
- `external_id` (String) Directory Group External ID

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Directory Group ID
